name: Copy History Support - Clipboard Manager, Paste
description: Compatible with Android 10. Clipboard manager. Save the history of copied text. Paste text with one touch.   History storage of copied text The text is automatically saved without duplication.   Favorites tab You can register your favorite word. Available as notes and template.   One-touch Paste in the dialog You can easily paste text without long pressing.   Copy the text of the screen You can copy the unselectable text on the screen.   Copy paste using the button Buttons are available to help you type.   Other features Add Favorites tab and folders Import and Export Quote the text of Contact Keyword search of the text Share the text Shortcut of App Shortcut of File   Remarks This app uses Accessibility services.   Link Twitter : https://twitter.com/JetToastDevelop YouTube : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCWn5bZ8h_ptMRsvqWi2UUrw
